eshmun.structures.kripke

Class MultiKripkeStructure

  • java.lang.Object
    • eshmun.structures.kripke.MultiKripkeStructure
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Repairable

    public class MultiKripkeStructure
extends java.lang.Object
implements Repairable
    This class represents a Multi-Kripke Structure, a set of KripkeStructures each matched to two processes.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ali Cherri, Kinan Dak Al Bab

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(KripkeStructure kripke)
        Adds the following KripkeStructure to this MultiStructure.

        The name of the KripkeStructure should be on the following form :
             {STRUCTURE_NAME}({PROCESS1}, {PROCESS2})
        White spaces do not matter, the name is used to determine the pair process.

        Parameters:
        kripke - the KripkeStructure to be added.

      • remove

        public void remove(KripkeStructure kripke)
        Remove the given KripkeStructure and its Process Pair.
        Parameters:
        kripke - the KripkeStructure to be removed.

      • processSynchronizationFormula

        public AndOperator processSynchronizationFormula()
        Construct the process-index based synchronization formula, this formula synchronizes "matching" transitions for each processes over all the structures.

        This formula is deduced, the state labels are projected into one process alone (i.e. labels not belonging to that process is ignored). Synchronization will occur over transition that will take the state from the same set of labels to the same resulting set of labels (projected to one process). This will be repeated for all processes.

        The formula necessitates that for a specific process, if all the transitions taking that process from one state (labels projected into that process alone) to another were deleted in one of the pair structures, they must be also deleted in all of the pair structures.

        Returns:
        the Structure Formula for this MultiKripkeStructure.

      • actionSynchronizationFormula

        public AndOperator actionSynchronizationFormula()
        Construct the action based synchronization formula, this formula synchronizes transition that are linked to the same action name over all pair structures.

        The formula necessitates that for a specific action name, if all the transitions that had that action name were deleted in one of the pair structures, they must be also deleted in all of the structures. Otherwise, at least one such transition must remain in all pair structures.

        Returns:
        the Structure Formula for this MultiKripkeStructure.

      • modelCheck

        public boolean modelCheck(java.util.List<AbstractExpression> specifications)
        Model checks this structure against the specifications.

        If this is a single structure, the specifications are conjuncted into one big specification.

        If this contains multiple structures, the specifications are each mapped to an inner structure then model checked separately.

        The implementation details are determined in the sub-classes.

        Specified by:
        modelCheck in interface Repairable
        Parameters:
        specifications - the specifications of this structure.
        Returns:
        true if the structure abides by the specifications, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        AbstractExpression

      • generateRepairFormula

        public AndOperator generateRepairFormula(java.util.List<AbstractExpression> specifications,
                                         boolean actionSync,
                                         boolean processSync)
                                  throws NotCNFException
        Generates the repair formula for this structure against the specifications.

        If this is a single structure, the specifications are conjuncted into one big specification, then the repair formula is generated against it.

        If this contains multiple structures, the specifications are each mapped to an inner structure, each structure then generates its own repair formula separately then they are all conjuncted, this helps avoid Exponential blow-ups.

        The implementation details are determined in the sub-classes.

        Specified by:
        generateRepairFormula in interface Repairable
        Parameters:
        specifications - the specifications of this structure.
        actionSync - flags whether or not to sync based on action names.
        processSync - flags whether or not to sync on process labels combined with from and to states labels.
        Returns:
        the repair formula of this structure against the specifications.
        Throws:
        NotCNFException - if some error occurred during conversion of specifications to cnf.
        See Also:
        AbstractExpression, actionSynchronizationFormula(), processSynchronizationFormula()

      • setCNF

        public void setCNF(boolean cnf)
        Sets the CNF flag. determines if the repair formula must be generated in CNF format.
        Specified by:
        setCNF in interface Repairable
        Parameters:
        cnf - if true the repair formula will be generated in CNF (false if for debugging purposes).
